summary: Comprehensive testing of Cafe Bill Generator app completed. All 23 menu categories (including Pizza, Pasta, Burgers) verified working. Dynamic theme customization, bill generation with modifiers and customer details, and navigation all functioning correctly.

design_issues.issue: Console warning: Missing 'Description' or 'aria-describedby' for DialogContent components

critical_code_review_comments: Minor accessibility warning in Dialog components - Missing aria-describedby attribute
seed_data_creation: Test bills created during testing with prefix TEST_ for customer names
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 23 menu categories are working including Pizza, Pasta, Burgers. Dynamic theming is functional - theme changes in Settings persist and apply across app. Bill generation with customer details (Name, Table, NIF), modifiers, and currency selector all working. Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, History, Reports, Settings, Menu Management) is functional.
passed_tests: GET /api/menu/categories returns all 23 categories including Pizza, Pasta, Burgers
POST /api/menu creates menu items with new categories (Pizza, Pasta, Burgers)
GET /api/config/theme returns current theme configuration
PUT /api/config/theme updates theme and persists changes
POST /api/config/theme/reset resets to default Espresso & Crema theme
POST /api/bills creates bills with customer_name, table_number, nif, currency
POST /api/bills correctly calculates modifiers in bill total
GET /api/bills retrieves bill history
GET /api/modifiers returns all default modifiers (Size, Cooking Preference, Milk Option, Extras)
GET /api/reports/daily returns daily sales data
GET /api/reports/range returns date range sales reports
Dashboard loads with all 23 category filter buttons visible
Category filtering displays correct items (tested Pizza, Pasta, Burgers categories)
Add to Order button opens modifier dialog for customizable items
Modifier selection (Size, Milk Option) works correctly with price adjustments
Customer details (Name, Table #, NIF) input fields work correctly
Currency selector with 5 currencies (EUR, USD, GBP, BRL, CHF) works
Generate Bill creates bill and shows Print/Download buttons
Settings page loads with 8 preset themes visible
Theme customization with color pickers works
Save Theme persists changes to database
Reset to Default restores Espresso & Crema theme
Navigation to History page works
Navigation to Reports page shows daily sales data
Navigation to Menu Management works
Navigation to Settings page works
